references.paper_title: 2-dimensional particle tracking velocimetry (ptv): technique and image processing algorithms
references.reason: This foundational paper established the core techniques for 2D particle tracking velocimetry, providing a basis for later advancements in 3D PTV.

references.paper_title: Fast high-dimensional filtering using the permutohedral lattice
references.reason: This paper introduced an efficient method for high-dimensional filtering, which is crucial for the splat-based zero-divergence loss implementation in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Particle-imaging techniques for experimental fluid mechanics
references.reason: This review paper provided a comprehensive overview of particle imaging techniques, which are essential for 3D PTV, and influenced the development of advanced flow visualization methods.

references.paper_title: SLIM: Self-supervised lidar scene flow and motion segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduced a self-supervised learning approach for scene flow estimation using LiDAR data, which is highly relevant to the self-supervised dual-frame fluid motion estimation in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Self-supervised learning with geometric constraints in monocular video: Connecting flow, depth, and camera
references.reason: This paper demonstrated the success of self-supervised learning for scene flow estimation from monocular videos, which inspired the self-supervised framework in this work.
